thread.title_full: Twitterati cannot control their excitement about Nokia 3310 coming back to life : FYI, News - India Today

title: Twitterati cannot control their excitement about Nokia 3310 coming back to life : FYI, News - India Today
text:
FYI Twitterati cannot control their excitement about Nokia 3310 coming back to life Twitter welcomes Nokia 3310 with arms wide open as it makes a comeback after 17 years, and also with some hilarious tweets. IndiaToday.in | Written by: Neha Vashishth A + A - Photo: Twitter/@TechCrunch 
After the recent launch of revamped Nokia 3310, the 'upbeat' and 'cool' old classic phone by the company, social media users have gone berserk. 
The new 3310 is loaded with features like a dual-sim slot, 2 MP read camera, expandable memory card slot and a 2.4 inch QVGA color display. 
With its new, refreshing looks, Nokia has gotten people excited. The good ol' gem which was famous for its strong built and the famous 'snake' game, was often referred to as a weapon of mass destruction. 
Nokia 3310, is back with a bang and so did memes and jokes on social media. 
Take a look at the hilarious tweets fresh from the world of Twitter: Nokia 3310 died and resurrected before Arsenal Could win a UCL trophy. â€” Hon Kuria (@hos_utd) February 26, 2017 Nokia 3310 is back and you're still single. #2017isharsh
